description: [``botocore``] AWS Elemental MediaConvert SDK has added support for rules that constrain Automatic-ABR rendition selection when generating ABR package ladders.
[``botocore``] Amazon Cognito now supports requiring attribute verification (ex. email and phone number) before update.

[``botocore``] This release adds Multi Account API support for a TGW Global Network, to enable and disable AWSServiceAccess with AwsOrganizations for Network Manager service and dependency CloudFormation StackSets service.
[``botocore``] Doc-only update. For MessageReviewHandler structure, added timeout period in the description of the fallbackResult field
[``botocore``] Stop Protection feature enables customers to protect their instances from accidental stop actions.
